abstract: The retailers temporarily shut down their online photo processing services to determine the extent of a possible credit card data breach.
snippet: The retailers temporarily shut down their online photo processing services to determine the extent of a possible credit card data breach.
lead_paragraph: CVS and Walmart Canada said on Friday that a data breach at a Canadian information technology vendor may have leaked credit card information from their online photo processing websites, possibly compromising data on millions of users.

headline.main: CVS and Walmart Canada Are Investigating a Data Breach
headline.print_headline: 2 Retailers Investigate Data Breach in Websites
